text: I'm having a problem with the header and footer of my dynamically generated pages, like blog post, my header and footer are not styled the same way as the other normal pages(css overides or desapears), I think that is a problem with cache but I do not know how to solve it. Does any one had this problem before?

hi!

Can you upload *.template.json to HubSpot? File was created by featching drag&drop template with HubSpot CLI and `hs upload`  as well as upload in GUI throws an error.
